dict.acceptation: 可接受的；合意的；（社会上）认同的；（礼物等）令人满意的；

sent.orig: Cooperation: Sole or joint investment is acceptable. And partial development is also acceptable.
sent.trans: 合作方式：合资、独资或成片开发均可。

sent.orig: Blisters are not acceptable. Improper adhesion which exposes bare metal is not acceptable.
sent.trans: 砂眼不可以接受。暴露金属底材的电镀附著不可接受。

sent.orig: Cooperation: Joint investment acceptable. Either developing the whole project or part of it is also acceptable.
sent.trans: 合作方式：合作、合资均可。既可整体开发，也可分区投资建设。

sent.orig: Glass bead blasting is acceptable. Steel shot blasting is not acceptable.
sent.trans: 可以喷玻璃砂，不可喷钢丸。

sent.orig: There shall be evidence that the external laboratory is acceptable to the customer.
sent.trans: 应有迹象表明顾客接受外部实验室。
